scripts.download-airnode: docker pull api3/airnode-client:0.3.1 && docker pull api3/airnode-admin:0.3.1 && docker pull api3/airnode-deployer:0.3.1
scripts.stop-airnode: docker stop quick-deploy-container-airnode && docker rm quick-deploy-container-airnode
scripts.start-airnode: docker run --detach --volume $(pwd)/config:/app/config --name quick-deploy-container-airnode api3/airnode-client:0.3.1 && docker logs --follow quick-deploy-container-airnode
scripts.deploy-airnode: docker run -it --rm --env-file aws.env -e USER_ID=$(id -u) -e GROUP_ID=$(id -g) -v "$(pwd)/config:/app/config" -v "$(pwd)/output:/app/output" api3/airnode-deployer:0.3.1 deploy
scripts.remove-airnode: docker run -it --rm --env-file aws.env -v "$(pwd)/output:/app/output" api3/airnode-deployer:0.3.1 remove -r output/receipt.json
